entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
